mapper.sql: ID, NAME, CUS_REPLACE, CONTACT, CONTACT_INFO, CREDIT_CODE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COM_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, OWNER_ADDRESS, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID,line_name_en,channel_id
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sys_real_name_authentication.id, sys_customer_unit. NAME, sys_customer_unit.CUS_REPLACE, sys_customer_unit.CONTACT, sys_customer_unit.CONTACT_INFO, sys_customer_unit.CREDIT_CODE, sys_real_name_authentication.CREATE_TIME, sys_real_name_authentication.UPDATE_TIME, sys_customer_unit.COM_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.INDUSTRY_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.ENTER_PIC, sys_customer_unit.AUTH_PIC, sys_customer_unit.SEX, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_ID, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_ADDR, sys_customer_unit.PIC1, sys_customer_unit.PIC2, sys_customer_unit.FACT_PIC, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_ADDRESS, sys_customer_unit.EMAIL, sys_real_name_authentication.VIN, sys_term_model_unit.SERIAL_NUMBER, sys_term_model_unit.IMEI, sys_sim_management.SIM_CART_NUMBER, sys_sim_management.ICCID, sys_sim_management.IMSI, sys_real_name_authentication.CREATE_USER_ID, sys_real_name_authentication.UPDATE_USER_ID, sys_real_name_authentication.syn_result, sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_RESULT, sys_real_name_authentication.REMARKS, sys_real_name_authentication.line_name_en, sys_real_name_authentication.channel_id FROM sys_real_name_authentication LEFT JOIN sys_customer_unit ON sys_customer_unit.id = sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_vehicle ON sys_real_name_authentication.vin = sys_vehicle.vin LEFT JOIN sys_term_model_unit ON sys_term_model_unit.id = sys_vehicle.term_id AND sys_term_model_unit.delete_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_sim_management ON sys_sim_management.iccid = sys_term_model_unit.iccid AND sys_sim_management.delete_type=1 WHERE sys_real_name_authentication.STATE = 1 AND AUTHENTICATION_TYPE = 2 UNION SELECT ID, NAME, CUS_REPLACE, CONTACT, CONTACT_INFO, CREDIT_CODE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COM_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, ENTER_PIC, AUTH_PIC, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, PIC1, PIC2, FACT_PIC, OWNER_ADDRESS, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, "0" AS syn_result, "0" AS AUTHENTICATION_RESULT, "未申请" AS REMARKS, line_name_en, channel_id FROM sys_authentication_company_temp ) temp where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_authentication_company_temp (ID, NAME, CUS_REPLACE, CONTACT, CONTACT_INFO, CREDIT_CODE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COM_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, OWNER_ADDRESS, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, ENTER_PIC, AUTH_PIC, PIC1, PIC2, FACT_PIC,line_name_en,channel_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusReplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{authPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{factPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{lineNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_authentication_company_temp
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_REPLACE = #{cusReplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_TYPE = #{comType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
OWNER_CERT_TYPE = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_CERT_ID = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_CERT_ADDR = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_ADDRESS = #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIM_CART_NUMBER = #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTER_PIC = #{enterPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
AUTH_PIC = #{authPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PIC1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PIC2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FACT_PIC = #{factPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
lineNameEn = #{lineNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channelId = #{factPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_authentication_company_temp set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUS_REPLACE = #{cusReplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_INFO = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_TYPE = #{comType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, OWNER_CERT_TYPE = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ID = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_CERT_ADDR = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_ADDRESS = #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIM_CART_NUMBER = #{simCartNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTER_PIC = #{enterPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, AUTH_PIC = #{authPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PIC1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PIC2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FACT_PIC = #{factPic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, line_name_en = #{lineNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{factPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sys_real_name_authentication.id, sys_customer_unit. NAME, sys_customer_unit.CUS_REPLACE, sys_customer_unit.CONTACT, sys_customer_unit.CONTACT_INFO, sys_customer_unit.CREDIT_CODE, sys_real_name_authentication.CREATE_TIME, sys_real_name_authentication.UPDATE_TIME, sys_customer_unit.COM_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.INDUSTRY_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.ENTER_PIC, sys_customer_unit.AUTH_PIC, sys_customer_unit.SEX, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_TYPE, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_ID, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_CERT_ADDR, sys_customer_unit.PIC1, sys_customer_unit.PIC2, sys_customer_unit.FACT_PIC, sys_customer_unit.OWNER_ADDRESS, sys_customer_unit.EMAIL, sys_real_name_authentication.VIN, sys_term_model_unit.SERIAL_NUMBER, sys_term_model_unit.IMEI, sys_sim_management.SIM_CART_NUMBER, sys_sim_management.ICCID, sys_sim_management.IMSI, sys_real_name_authentication.CREATE_USER_ID, sys_real_name_authentication.UPDATE_USER_ID, sys_real_name_authentication.syn_result, sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_RESULT, sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_ID, sys_real_name_authentication.REMARKS, sys_real_name_authentication.line_name_en, sys_real_name_authentication.channel_id, case sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_RESULT when '0' then '未申请' when '1' then '认证中' when '2' then '已通过' else '未通过' end RESULT_MESSAGE FROM sys_real_name_authentication LEFT JOIN sys_customer_unit ON sys_customer_unit.id = sys_real_name_authentication.AUTHENTICATION_ID LEFT JOIN sys_vehicle ON sys_real_name_authentication.vin = sys_vehicle.vin LEFT JOIN sys_term_model_unit ON sys_term_model_unit.id = sys_vehicle.term_id AND sys_term_model_unit.delete_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_sim_management ON sys_sim_management.iccid = sys_term_model_unit.iccid AND sys_sim_management.delete_type = 1 WHERE sys_real_name_authentication.STATE = 1 AND AUTHENTICATION_TYPE = 2 UNION SELECT ID, NAME, CUS_REPLACE, CONTACT, CONTACT_INFO, CREDIT_CODE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COM_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, ENTER_PIC, AUTH_PIC, SEX, OWNER_CERT_TYPE, OWNER_CERT_ID, OWNER_CERT_ADDR, PIC1, PIC2, FACT_PIC, OWNER_ADDRESS, EMAIL, VIN, SERIAL_NUMBER, IMEI, SIM_CART_NUMBER, ICCID, IMSI, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_ID, "0" AS syn_result, "0" AS AUTHENTICATION_RESULT, "0" AS AUTHENTICATION_ID, "未申请" REMARKS, line_name_en, channel_id, "未申请" RESULT_MESSAGE FROM sys_authentication_company_temp ) temp WHERE 1 = 1
AND SIM_CART_NUMBER LIKE concat('%',#{SIM_CART_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ICCID LIKE concat('%',#{ICCID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND AUTHENTICATION_RESULT = #{AUTHENTICATION_RESULT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND VIN LIKE concat('%',#{VIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND SERIAL_NUMBER LIKE concat('%',#{SERIAL_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND CONTACT LIKE concat('%',#{CONTACT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND OWNER_CERT_ID LIKE concat('%',#{OWNER_CERT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND CONTACT_INFO LIKE concat('%',#{CONTACT_INFO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND NAME LIKE concat('%',#{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER by UPDATE_TIME desc
